Longhorns Crushing Medical Debt

Our mission is to ensure that a medical crisis should not be followed by a financial crisis. We assist patients in need in eliminating their medical debt through hospital charity care policies.

About Us Clear Up Medical Debt

PATIENT ADVOCACY

Volunteer to help patients secure debt relief through Dollar For's financial assistance application.

OUTREACH

Reach out to our local community and make Dollar For's services accessible to all who need them.

MARKETING

Get involved in fundraising money for Dollar for.

COMMUNICATIONS

Collaborate with community leaders to promote and spread information about new policies regarding medical debt.
